explanation: The original if line accessed s1[1] and s2[1] without checking that those indices exist, which causes an IndexError when an input string has length 1 (or is empty). I fixed it by adding length checks so each character access is only attempted when that position exists: check len(s1)>0 and len(s2)>0 before accessing [0], and len(s1)>1 and len(s2)>1 before accessing [1].
